Class RequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • RequestManager

  • public class RequestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This RequestManager class is used when we need to submit new request, edit existing request, approve or reject a request, assign request, update request status It connects with database and Main, SubmitRequest, EditRequest GUI
    Author:
    JasonZheng, AlexXia

        public java.lang.String getField(int id,
                                 java.lang.String fieldName,
                                 java.lang.String tableName)
        This method is to get certain fields from the database The field includes type, first_name, last_name, status that associate with the unique ID. This is also a helper method for getUserName method
        Parameters:
        id - the id in the table
        fieldName - field name in the table
        tableName - table name
        Returns:
        field the field in database corresponding the to the input info

        public java.lang.String getRequestDescription(Request request)
        This method is to get a request's type and summary as request description The return string will be presented on the MainGUI
        Parameters:
        request - input request object
        Returns:
        a string combines the type and summary of the request

      • updateLog

        public void updateLog(Request request,
                      java.lang.String log)
        This method is to update comment logs for each request
        Parameters:
        request - the request object that needs to be updated
        log - the updated log that will be inserted into database

      • insertRequest

        public void insertRequest(int requestID,
                          int typeID,
                          int requesterID,
                          java.lang.String submitDate,
                          int tatRequest,
                          java.lang.String summary,
                          int requestStatusID,
                          java.lang.String acceptDate,
                          java.lang.String dueDate,
                          int tatFinal,
                          int assigneeID,
                          java.lang.String log)
        This method is to create a new request and insert it into the database.
        Parameters:
        requestID - request ID
        typeID - different type of analysis for the request, predefined in database
        requesterID - requester ID
        submitDate - request submit date in format "yyyy-mm-dd"
        tatRequest - turn-around-time request input by requester
        summary - request summary input by requester
        requestStatusID - status ID of the request, predefined in database
        acceptDate - request accepted date in format "yyyy-mm-dd"
        dueDate - request due date in format "yyyy-mm-dd"
        tatFinal - the final turn-around-time of the request, calculate after request close
        assigneeID - assignee ID
        log - the log of the request

      • updateRequest

        public void updateRequest(int requestID,
                          int typeID,
                          int tatRequest,
                          java.lang.String summary,
                          int requestStatusID,
                          java.lang.String acceptDate,
                          java.lang.String dueDate,
                          int tatFinal,
                          int assigneeID,
                          java.lang.String log)
        This method is to update an existing request in the database.
        Parameters:
        requestID - request ID
        typeID - different type of analysis for the request, predefined in database
        tatRequest - turn-around-time request input by requester
        summary - request summary input by requester
        requestStatusID - status ID of the request, predefined in database
        acceptDate - request accepted date in format "yyyy-mm-dd"
        dueDate - request due date in format "yyyy-mm-dd"
        tatFinal - the final turn-around-time of the request, calculate after request close
        assigneeID - assignee ID
        log - the log of the request

                                            java.lang.String condition)

        Parameters:
        getAll - get all the entrys in the table or not
        tableName - table name
        columnName - column name
        columnNumber - how many columns of data will be returned
        condition - condition used in SQL query
        Returns:

      • getRequestFromLastNDays

        public java.util.ArrayList<Request> getRequestFromLastNDays(java.util.ArrayList<Request> allRequests,
                                                            int day)
        This helper method is a filter that returns the list of requests that submitted in the last N days
        Parameters:
        allRequests: - an ArrayList of request that on the request board
        day - the days from now
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the requests that matches the input request

      • getComparator

        public java.util.Comparator<Request> getComparator(java.lang.String field)
        This helper method returns a comparator for sorting with different fields
        Parameters:
        field: - a field in the request, that the sorting will be based on.
        Returns:
        a comparator that will be used in the Collection.sort() method
